main_product_data.title: Bamboo Bay 4 Piece King Size Sheet Set, 100% Viscose Made from Bamboo, Breathable, Ultra Soft Cooling Bed Sheets for Hot Sleepers, Beddings with Deep Pockets Fit 16" Mattress, White
main_product_data.description: Soft, Luxurious, & Gentle on Skin. Our Bed Sheets Set is made from 100% viscose derived from bamboo. With a silky, breathable weave, these bed sheets feel cool and smooth, making it perfect for restful, skin-friendly sleep.    Stay Cool & Dry All Night. Designed for hot sleepers, our cooling sheets wick away moisture, reduce heat build-up, and fight night sweats. These king size bed sheets help regulate body temp so you stay cool and dry, and wake up feeling refreshed.    Complete King Size Set. This king size sheets set includes 1 fitted sheet (78” x 80”), 1 flat sheet (108” x 106”), and 2 oversized pillowcases (20” x 40”). With its deep pockets and reinforced elastic, our bed sheet set can fit mattresses up to 16”.    Naturally Safe & Planet-Friendly. Our premium king size sheets are OEKO-TEX certified, free from harsh chemicals, safe for you, and kinder to the planet. Made from sustainable materials, they’re machine washable, fade-resistant, and easy to clean.    Veteran Founded & 180-Night Promise. Our king size bedding set and pillowcases are part of a USA-based, veteran-founded small business. We take pride in our quality, provide unrivaled customer support, customer satisfaction and a 180-night promise.

MAXIMUM COMFORT & WARMTH: Give a warm welcome to our softest, coziest, and most gentle fitted sheet yet. Made with extra soft Turkish cotton for a superb feel that will keep you toasty warm during the cold winter months.    PREMIUM QUALITY: Our innovative signature flannel fitted sheets are double brushed to meet our high standard for softness. Long lasting quality and supreme softness combine to give you the coziest set of fitted sheets you will ever own. Contains no toxic or harmful chemicals, great for those with sensitive skin.    EASY CARE: Bedtime is supposed to be relaxing. That’s why our flannel sheets are machine washable and designed to perform flawlessly every day, night, or nap time.    REST ASSURED: Your first 30 nights are on us. Literally. If you don’t love our sheets, send them back.

main_product_data.description: 100% Egyptian Cotton Percale - This 6 Piece California King Size Bedding Set: 1 flat sheet (108"W x 106"L), 1 bottom fitted sheet (72"W x 84"L) with all around elastic (fits 8" to 16" mattresses) and 4 king size pillowcases (21"W x 36"L) with envelope closures to fit king size pillows.    Authentic Egyptian Cotton: Meticulously woven from 100% certified Egyptian cotton in a crisp percale weave, these sheets and pillowcases embody refined luxury with a cool, airy feel and smooth, matte finish, ensuring year-round comfort and unmatched breathability. Each piece bears the Official Gold Seal of Authenticity, ensuring a truly premium slumber.    Certified Safe: Certified Oeko Tex Standard 100, so no harmful substances are used to make this product.    Easy Care: Durable, does not wrinkle, won't fade, pill, or shrink. Machine wash and tumble dry at normal setting.    Our Commitment: We prioritize comfort, community, and sustainability. Since 2022, we’ve donated over 36,000 bedding items to US charities. We use no plastic packaging and craft each sheet in our family-owned factory in India with care. Experience affordable luxury with responsibly made products and hassle-free returns.

main_product_data.title: King Sheets Deep Pocket King Sheet Set, 100% Cotton Bed Sheets, 400 Thread Count 4 Pc Sateen Weave Luxury Bedding Sheet & Pillowcase Sets, Soft & Comfy Naturally Cool, No Pill Machine Washable- Ivory
main_product_data.brand: Visit the CHATEAU HOME COLLECTION Store
main_product_data.description: 400 THREAD COUNT KING BEDDING SETS: Experience the silky-smooth comfort of our 100% Egyptian cotton sheets king, expertly crafted to provide a luxuriously soft, breathable sleep environment. Featuring a lustrous sateen weave, these bed sheets king offer a subtle sheen and a smooth, elegant finish. Egyptian cotton is renowned for its durability and exceptional softness    EASY CARE FOR LONG-LASTING COMFORT: To maintain the luxurious softness and durability of your Egyptian cotton king sheets, avoid washing or drying on high heat. Excessive heat can weaken the long-staple fibers, cause shrinkage, and diminish the longevity of your premium sheets. For best results, machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low. Gentle care keeps your sheets soft, smooth, and beautiful—wash after wash.    This premium king bed sheets set includes 1 flat sheet (110 x 104 ), 1 deep pocket fitted sheet (79 x 81) that fits mattresses 17" deep, and 2 king pillowcases (21 x 41 ) with envelope closures. Our enhanced 360º elastic and foot/head tags ensure a secure, no-slip fit and hassle-free bed-making. Crafted from OEKO-TEX certified egyptian cotton, our deep pocket king sheet set are packaged without plastic and built to last    A MEANINGFUL GIFT FOR EVERY OCCASION: Whether it’s a housewarming, wedding, anniversary, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, or simply a thoughtful gesture—our Egyptian cotton sheet set makes a luxurious and practical gift. Elegantly packaged and crafted with care, it’s a beautiful way to offer comfort while showing appreciation for quality and craftsmanship.    CHATEAU HOME COLLECTION – A BRAND TO REMEMBER: At Chateau Home Collection, we believe true luxury should be both indulgent and responsible. That’s why our bedding is made from 100% Egyptian cotton—celebrated for its exceptional softness and strength. Carekingy crafted and OEKO-TEX certified, our sheets reflect a commitment to quality, comfort, and sustainability—helping you sleep better, naturally.

main_product_data.description: Luxury Bedding Set- Luxury 3pc Twin XL Satin Sheets Sets- 1 flat sheet 66"x102", 1 fitted sheet 39"x80"x14", 1 pillowcases 20"x30". Deep pockets that fit mattresses up to 14" deep with elastic around the fitted sheet. These bed sheets grip and fit better than any other sheet set! Beneficial for Hair and Skin – The smooth surface of satin fabric helps reduce hair breakage and tangling. Waking up with messy hair is no longer a concern. Our premium satin bedding set is crafted from high-quality, breathable, and ultra-soft material. Designed to provide a cool and comfortable sleeping experience and promote restful sleep.    Ultra Soft& Smooth Material- Satin fabric is more durable and less pilling than silk sheets. Envelop closure (no zipper) design | wrinkle resistant, comfort and better fit. The Envelope closure end design prevents your pillows escaping from pillowcase during your sweet dream.    Easy to Care- Our satin sheets set is machine washable in cold water and tumble dry low, do not bleach! If your skin is sensitive, we suggest you to wash it before using. main_product_data.title: Simple&Opulence Belgian Linen Sheet Set Solid Color - 5 Pieces (1 Flat Sheet, 2 Fitted Sheets & 2 Pillowcases) Natural Flax Cotton Blend Soft Breathable Farmhouse Bedding - Split King Size, Rust
main_product_data.description: 55%linen 45%cotton    MATERIAL — Made of 55% Euro Flax 45% Cotton Fabric, Premium Quality! 160 GSM (For make the fabric soft, the fabric handling process will cause an uncontrollable shrinkage, so the final GSM will have 5% more or less deviation). Our linen products has been certified according to STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX, which is eco-friendly. This fabric combine the breathable of linen and soft of the cotton, which is durable, and of course, affordable for you.    SPLIT KING SIZE — 1 x Flat Sheet: 108"*102", 2 x Fitted Sheets: 39"*80" x 14", 2 x Pillowcases: 20" x 40". Applied in a variety of occasions and uses: Your apartment, children’s room, guest room, gift/ present for your relatives or your friends, also affordable and durable for the inn, homestay and hotel.    ADVANTAGE — Unique breathable, cool feeling in summer, no sweating concern; Also a great choice for winter, wonderfully warm. Heat conduction and moisture absorption is larger than cotton fabric, you will get great nights sleep. Good color fastness, not easy to fade. This linen sheet set will exceed all of your needs.    USE INSTRUCTION — Machine washable, gentle cycle wash under 60℃ with similar colors. Do not dry clean. Do not use detergent that contains bleach or whitener. Tumble dry at low heat. Iron on medium heat if needed. Linen fabric will becomes softer after every wash.    VALUE SET — Mattress Cover is Deep Pocket design, up to 14 inches. The elastic is all around the fitted sheet. ◆TIPS—The 100% linen duvet cover set/fitted sheet/pillowcases are available, you can find their image options at the bottom of the description.

main_product_data.description: Indulge in Unmatched Comfort: Experience the pinnacle of luxury with Cool+ Cooling Queen size sheets set by Coop, made from fabrics that are not only silky soft, but remarkably cool to the touch. This queen or king size sheets set offers a heavenly softness that rivals silk sheets or satin sheets. Dive into a cocoon of comfort and enjoy a truly rejuvenating sleep every night!    Stay Cool, Stay Fresh: Designed for year-round comfort, these breathable and cooling queen bedding sets are your perfect companion for hot summers and cozy winters. Each queen bed sheets set includes 1 flat sheet, 1 fitted sheet, and 2 pillowcases, ensuring a snug fit and a restful sleep without overheating. Embrace coolness without compromising on comfort!    Durability Meets Elegance: Our cooling queen size sheet set is engineered to withstand the test of time. Resistant to shrinking, pilling, stains, and wrinkles, they maintain their crisp color and soft texture even after multiple washes. Elevate your bedding with the timeless elegance of Cool+ Cooling by Coop, available in twin, full, queen or king sizes.    Luxury Redefined: Experience the elegance enjoyed by 97% of Forbes luxury spas and resorts with Cool+ Cooling queen, king, twin, or full size bed sheets by Coop. Transform your home into a haven of relaxation and opulence with our cooling deep pocket queen sheets or king sheets, available in White and Dove Gray colors. Pamper yourself and your guests with the ultimate in comfort and style!    Sustainably Better: Our cooling queen sheets set are not just luxurious but also environmentally conscious. Unlike traditional cotton sheets, our Cool+ Cooling queen bed set is designed to be durable and long lasting. These cooling sheets are not only luxurious but also easy to care for. Machine washable, stain releasing, quick drying, and wrinkle free, they save you time and energy while maintaining their high-quality standard. Embrace sustainability without compromising on quality!

main_product_data.title: Threadmill 100% Cotton Sheets for Queen Size Bed - 600 Thread Count Queen Bed Sheets Set with 16” Deep Pocket - Jacquard Sateen Weave 4-Piece Bedding Set with Cooling Effect, Folkstone Blue
main_product_data.description: 100% PURE COTTON & SATEEN WEAVE FOR ULTIMATE SOFTNESS, COMFORT & BREATHABILITY: Made using extra-long staple cotton yarns, our 600 thread count Queen sheet set are the perfect combination of smoothness, breathability, and durability. Meticulously crafted using sateen weave, these bed sheets offer divine softness and long-lasting shine at a perfectly reasonable price. The lightweight and cooling bedding also provides absolute comfort from night sweats all year long.    EXTRA DEEP POCKET WITH ALL-AROUND ELASTIC FOR A SNUG FIT: Indulge in the luxurious feel of our 4 piece Queen sheet set which includes 1 flat sheet (92" W x 102" L), 1 fitted sheet (60" W x 80" L + 16" deep pocket) and 2 Standard pillowcases (20" W x 30" L). The elasticized bottom sheet has a sizable deep pocket, making it perfect for both tall and pillow-top mattresses. Pull, tuck, and relax - its snug fit ensures the bedsheet stays intact while you enjoy a deep slumber.    PREMIUM QUALITY & EASY TO CARE BEDDING FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE: Each sheet is expertly woven together to ensure no pilling, fade-resistance, and long-lasting strength. The extra long staple cotton yarns ensure there are no loose fibers after regular washes. We recommend machine washing the sheets at room temperature and tumble drying them on low to accentuate its softness and prevent shrinkage.    IDEAL GIFT & BRILLIANT ADDITION TO YOUR HOME LINENS: Feel the luxurious texture of a higher thread count sheet with our 600 thread count hotel-style bed set. Light, pastel, or dark, the use of high-quality dyes gives all our bed sheets a brilliant color that complements every room’s decor. Its elegant look and lustrous shine offer the feel of royale bedding, making it the best gift choice for all your loved ones - mother, father, husband, wife, or kids. main_product_data.title: Bedsure Cotton Duvet Cover King - 100% Cotton Waffle Weave Coconut White Duvet Cover King Size, GentleSoft™ and Breathable Bedding Set for All Season, 3 Pieces, 104"x90"
main_product_data.description: Classic Home Decor: Transform your bedroom with the sculptural beauty of 3D waffle weave. Its soft, grid-like texture adds subtle sophistication, layering gracefully with pillows and throws to create a serene, stylish, magazine-ready centerpiece    Pure Cotton Bliss: Woven from 100% cotton, this duvet cover wraps you in a gentle cocoon of pure, breathable fibers. Soft and airy, it cradles you like a whisper of clouds, inviting you to drift into peaceful nights embraced by timeless elegance and quiet serenity    Dual-Layer Softness: Thoughtfully crafted with two complementary textures—the outer waffle weave brings cozy dimension, while the inner percale layer melts against your skin with buttery softness, smooth and creamy to the touch—balancing plush comfort with an airy, feather-light feel    Thoughtful Details: 8 inside corner ties and a hidden button keep the filling secure, preventing bunching. A spare button offers extra peace of mind, and the duvet cover comes in a reusable fabric tote, making it a perfect, thoughtful gift this holiday season    Enhanced Durability: Recognized by the Good Housekeeping Seal, this duvet cover set delivers proven performance and reliable quality. Made from 100% cotton, it is machine-washable and grows softer with every wash—without excessive shrinking or wrinkling    What You Get: This Bedsure cotton king size duvet cover set comes with 1 duvet cover (104" x 90") and 2 pillow shams (20" x 36"). For a more elegant, draped look, consider sizing up 1–2 sizes based on mattress height

main_product_data.title: Breescape Cooling Sheet Set King Size - BlendTek™ Dry & Cool Technology for Hot Sleepers and Night Sweats, Q-Max>0.46 Tech, Deep Pocket Up to 18", 360° Elastic Band, Misty Gray
main_product_data.description: What You Get: This sheet set includes 1 flat sheet (106" x 108"), 1 fitted sheet (77" x 77"), 2 pillowcases (20" x 36"), the flat sheet offers up to 15.3% more coverage to standard flat sheet, draping nicely to gently hug your body for all-around comfort.    Whole-Night Cooling: Start experiencing breezier nights with our Breescape cooling sheet set. Crafted with our innovative BlendTek fiber, it’s 3.1x cooler than bamboo rayon, 4.5x more breathable than cotton, and 1.5x more moisture-absorbent. Plus, with a Q-Max value of 0.46, it ensures you're sleeping on fabric that's instantly cool to the touch and stays that way all night.    Temperature & Moisture Control: Our cooling bed sheets for hot sleepers are created with a unique polygonal fiber structure that's optimal for wicking away moisture, paired with breathable fiber gaps that enhance airflow. This combination helps heat and moisture escape quickly, keeping you comfortable throughout the night.    Thoughtful Details: Every sheet set comes with deep pockets to fit mattresses up to 18 inches deep, ensuring a secure, snug fit on various bed sizes. Convenient side pockets keep essentials within reach, while the 360° elastic band offers a smooth, stay-in-place hold with anti-slip protection.    Share the Comfort: Our BlendTek fibers, 6x finer than silk, are ultra-soft and gentle on sensitive skin, creating a lightweight, cloud-like feel. Plus, it's packaged in a gift-ready box with a handheld fan and laundry bag, making it the perfect way to share comfort with your loved ones.    Enhanced Durability: With reinforced double-stitching, these cooling sheets are built to withstand daily use. To keep them feeling fresh, simply machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low.
